channel.title: Mode 13h GUI base
channel.description:
Wrote this over the past few days to brush up on C. I compiled with DJGPP (ew) but it should be pretty portable (slight structure name changes etc).
So what does it do? It's a small framework for building GUI apps from scratch. The example program (main.c) creates a window and assigns "on click" callback functions to 2 buttons.
It's all there, and it could be pretty useful if more controls were added. Mouse support is there too.
Windows, static text, and buttons are implemented. It should be pretty stable.
Source and demo app .exe: http://strictfp.com/files/gui.zip
